channel.title: R Markdown on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on A Hugo website

item.title: TA_class_1017
item.description: New Project File > New Project.. New Project Set the directory name and the subdirectory. R Markdown You can write the report with RMarkdown. It can generate HTML, PDF, Word, and PPT documents. Furthermore, math equations can be write with LaTex format. Find the cheet sheet from Help > Cheetsheets > R Markdown Cheet Sheet Create your R Markdown! R Markdown Add the title and author name.

item.title: 統計學與實習
item.description: 10/17 迴圈、敘述統計、機率模型 學習目標 比較常態分佈 相同的平均值，不同的標準差 不同的平均值，相同的標準差 資料框 data frame 建立資料框 法一 df <- data.frame(a = 1:3, b = 4:6) #>
